headline: Less than 2 years after Flexport bought Convoy’s tech stack, it’s being sold to DAT
summary: Flexport is selling the Convy tech stack to DAT, less than two years after it bought it from the defunct digital brokerage. The post Less than 2 years after Flexport bought Convoy’s tech stack, it’s being sold to DAT appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: US Kids Food and Beverage Market Forecast and Company Analysis Report 2025-2033 Conagra, PepsiCo, Kellogg, Campbell Soup, General Mills, Nestle, Lifeway Foods, The Hershey Company
summary: The United States Kids Food and Beverage Market is projected to surge to US$ 100.16 billion by 2033 from US$ 57.02 billion in 2024, marking a CAGR of 6.46% from 2025 to 2033. This growth is driven by increased health consciousness, demand for organic products, and innovative offerings addressing parental concerns over childhood obesity and influenced by social media marketing. Key market trends include rising interest in organic, low-calorie, and allergy-free products. State-specific trends, inc

headline: PepsiCo (PEP) Partners With Cargill to Advance Regenerative Farming Across Corn Supply Chain
summary: PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) ranks among the best low volatility stocks to buy according to analysts. On July 15, PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) and Cargill announced that they would collaborate to apply regenerative agriculture practices to 240,000 acres of farmland in Iowa by 2030. The initiative will focus on the companies’ joint corn supply chain in Iowa, […]
